title: Convert string to dotcase
contentHtml:
Write a program to convert string to dotcase

Dotcase is a style of writing in which all letters are lowercase and spaces are replaced with periods.

Input  : "hello world"
Output : "hello.world"

markdown:
## Write a program to convert string to dotcase

Dotcase is a style of writing in which all letters are lowercase and spaces are replaced with periods.

```
Input  : "hello world"
Output : "hello.world"
```
